amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the Export-Import Bank from providing assistance for transactions involving the import or export of goods or services with companies that are at least 50 percent owned by a foreign government or the military of a foreign government.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the Export-Import Bank from extending credit or any other financial assistance in connection with an enterprise involved with the import or export of goods or services with a firm that is at least 50% owned by the governmetn or military of a foreign country.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A004) Failed by voice vote.
